name: 'Third Day Story' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the first one to find out that the President fired Leo?
questions.explanation:
Abbey.

	After Abbey said that stress could cut off the flow of blood to the heart and that it was nothing the President did, the President told her that he fired Leo the night before and wanted to know what that would do to the flow of blood to the heart.

questions.text: Which country did Josh say had a President that made a national holiday for his favorite melon?
questions.explanation:
Turkmenistan.

	Josh also said that the same man told his people that they should chew on dog bones to strengthen their teeth. Josh referred to the man as Zeppo Marx.

questions.text: Did Donna come back to work?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Josh wheeled her into the White House the day after she arrived home from Germany. Josh gave her one of the pens from the signing of the peace agreement because he referred to her as a blood donor for the peace agreement.

questions.text: Who told the President about Leo's heart attack?
questions.explanation:
Charlie.

	They had only been back in Washington D.C. for a short time when Charlie came into the Oval Office and told the President that Barracks Security found Leo in the woods at Camp David.

questions.text: Whose idea was it first to get statements endorsing the peace plan from every member of the United Nation Security Council?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	CJ mentioned it to Carol upon entering her office and a few seconds later Toby came in and told CJ to do it and he would back her up by saying it was her idea. After Toby left, Josh came in and told CJ to  do the same thing that Toby told her to do.

questions.text: How does this quote from Josh end? "It's like a torture chamber designed by _____________________."
questions.explanation:
Renegade Keebler Elves.

	Josh made this comment after he saw all the baskets of sweets that CJ had sent to the hospital waiting room to bother him.

questions.text: If Josh stayed off junk food for one week, what was CJ going to do for him?
questions.correct: Cook him dinner wearing an apron and floppy hat
options: Say "Josh Lyman is king" every time she entered a room
questions.explanation:
Cook him dinner wearing an apron and floppy hat.

	CJ told Josh she would wear anything he wanted her to wear and then changed her mind when she saw the look on his face. He agreed to the deal and threw away the donut he was eating.

False.

	Charlie told Donna that he needed to file some paperwork and take a swim test. When Donna asked him why he hadn't done that, Charlie told her it was because the President made him promise when he graduated college he would quit as the President's 'body man'.

questions.text: When the President told Josh about a letter that the State Department received from Turkmenistan, what did he say was sent to the country?
questions.explanation:
Pizzas.

	Josh received two pizzas from CJ and Donna made the joke that he should send them to Turkmenistan. He did and Turkmenistan sent a letter back saying they didn't order them.

questions.text: Who did the President ask "to jump off a cliff"?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	When Leo woke up from surgery, he asked the President to remember what he asked Leo when he made him Chief of Staff. The President went out and asked CJ if she would jump off a cliff.
